com.xconns.peerdevicenet

Interface RouterGroupClient.GroupHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    RouterGroupClient

    public static interface RouterGroupClient.GroupHandler
    GroupHandler exposes client side async messaging one-way AIDL api to allow GroupService notify events such as peer devices joining group, peer devices leaving a group or receiving a message.

    It exposes the following groups of callback methods in accordance with GroupHandler aidl api:

    • Group membership change detection: 
       void onPeerJoin(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
 void onPeerLeave(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
 void onSelfJoin(DeviceInfo[] peersInfo)
 void onSelfLeave()
    • receive messages from group peer devices: 
       void onReceive(DeviceInfo src, byte[] msg)
    • info query: 
       void onGetPeerDevices(DeviceInfo[] devices)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(java.lang.String errInfo)
      Notify clients about two kinds of errors: errors happening at server processing.
      void onGetPeerDevices(DeviceInfo[] devices)
      Reply to client info of peer devices in group; this is the response to getPeerDevices() api call.
      void onPeerJoin(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
      notify client that a peer device joined the group.
      void onPeerLeave(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
      notify client that a peer device has left the group.
      void onReceive(DeviceInfo src, byte[] msg)
      notify client that a message arrived from a peer device.
      void onSelfJoin(DeviceInfo[] peersInfo)
      notify clients that it has joined the group successfully; and returning the info of peer devices in this group.
      void onSelfLeave()
      notify client that it finished leaving the group.

    • Method Detail

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.String errInfo)
        Notify clients about two kinds of errors:
        • errors happening at server processing.
        • errors happening at client invoking GroupService api.
        Parameters:
        errInfo - the detailed error message

      • onSelfJoin

        void onSelfJoin(DeviceInfo[] peersInfo)
        notify clients that it has joined the group successfully; and returning the info of peer devices in this group.
        Parameters:
        peersInfo - info of peer devices in this group.

      • onPeerJoin

        void onPeerJoin(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
        notify client that a peer device joined the group.
        Parameters:
        peerInfo - info of peer device which just joined.

      • onSelfLeave

        void onSelfLeave()
        notify client that it finished leaving the group.

      • onPeerLeave

        void onPeerLeave(DeviceInfo peerInfo)
        notify client that a peer device has left the group.
        Parameters:
        peerInfo - info of peer device which just left.

      • onReceive

        void onReceive(DeviceInfo src,
             byte[] msg)
        notify client that a message arrived from a peer device.
        Parameters:
        src - info of device sending the message.
        msg - message received.

      • onGetPeerDevices

        void onGetPeerDevices(DeviceInfo[] devices)
        Reply to client info of peer devices in group; this is the response to getPeerDevices() api call.
        Parameters:
        devices -
